D'a:
Watermark D.a. can be distinguished by a very scrawny line quality, the initials VA below the shield and a chain line running through the center of the watermark.

________________________________________________________________________

This watermark can be found on the following prints:

  • The return of the prodigal son, 1636, (B. 91 only state/ NHD 159 i), Herzog Anton Ulrich-Museum, Braunschweig (HAUM 5453). Folio sheet.

(Erik Hinterding, Rembrandt as an Etcher, 2006, II, 63)
